        limit - limit of the knapsack
        weights - all weights to be put in the knapsack

        Parameters:
        w - weights to be put in the bag
        r - values of the weights
        n - current item type
        limit - weight limit of the knapsack
        Returns:
        the maximum possible score of values in the knapsack
